Articles.Content:
When planting a flag, my kerbal spins and I lose control, and if I load a previous save and go into map view the game crashes, and my speed is NaN

version:1.11 

How to reproduce

1. Land on nemesis (I am using a planet pack)

2. Go on Eva

3.  plant a flag.

i don’t know exactly why this is happening, bit it might have to do with persistent rotation?

Adding ksp version

I think my save game got corrupted

Edit:loaded a quicksave, so it didn’t completely corrupt my game. Would sill like to know why this happened

Adding context
Removed Persistent rotation and This bug no longer happens
